mapper.select:
/* kr.go.bai.eip.faa.cav.dao.FAACAV215QMapper.selectLoadSttcList */
SELECT CASE WHEN SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),6,2) = '12' THEN TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)) ELSE TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)-1) END AS AUD_YR ,'0' AS ROW_KND_CD ,'Y' AS VIEW_YN ,'계' AS STTC_TIT1 ,'0' AS STTC_COL1 ,'0' AS STTC_COL2 ,'0' AS STTC_COL3 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT CASE WHEN SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),6,2) = '12' THEN TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)) ELSE TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)-1) END AS AUD_YR ,'1' AS ROW_KND_CD ,'Y' AS VIEW_YN ,'재정경제감사국' AS STTC_TIT1 ,'0' AS STTC_COL1 ,'0' AS STTC_COL2 ,'0' AS STTC_COL3 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT CASE WHEN SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),6,2) = '12' THEN TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)) ELSE TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)-1) END AS AUD_YR ,'2' AS ROW_KND_CD ,'Y' AS VIEW_YN ,'산업금융감사국' STTC_TIT1 ,'0' AS STTC_COL1 ,'0' AS STTC_COL2 ,'0' AS STTC_COL3 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT CASE WHEN SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),6,2) = '12' THEN TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)) ELSE TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)-1) END AS AUD_YR ,'3' AS ROW_KND_CD ,'Y' AS VIEW_YN ,'국토해양감사국' AS STTC_TIT1 ,'0' AS STTC_COL1 ,'0' AS STTC_COL2 ,'0' AS STTC_COL3 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT CASE WHEN SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),6,2) = '12' THEN TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)) ELSE TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)-1) END AS AUD_YR ,'4' AS ROW_KND_CD ,'Y' AS VIEW_YN ,'공공기관감사국' AS STTC_TIT1 ,'0' AS STTC_COL1 ,'0' AS STTC_COL2 ,'0' AS STTC_COL3 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT CASE WHEN SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),6,2) = '12' THEN TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)) ELSE TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)-1) END AS AUD_YR ,'5' AS ROW_KND_CD ,'Y' AS VIEW_YN ,'전략감사단' AS STTC_TIT1 ,'0' AS STTC_COL1 ,'0' AS STTC_COL2 ,'0' AS STTC_COL3 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT CASE WHEN SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),6,2) = '12' THEN TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)) ELSE TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)-1) END AS AUD_YR ,'6' AS ROW_KND_CD ,'Y' AS VIEW_YN ,'시설안전감사단' AS STTC_TIT1 ,'0' AS STTC_COL1 ,'0' AS STTC_COL2 ,'0' AS STTC_COL3 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT CASE WHEN SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),6,2) = '12' THEN TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)) ELSE TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)-1) END AS AUD_YR ,'7' AS ROW_KND_CD ,'Y' AS VIEW_YN ,'사회복지감사국' AS STTC_TIT1 ,'0' AS STTC_COL1 ,'0' AS STTC_COL2 ,'0' AS STTC_COL3 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT CASE WHEN SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),6,2) = '12' THEN TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)) ELSE TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)-1) END AS AUD_YR ,'8' AS ROW_KND_CD ,'Y' AS VIEW_YN ,'행정안전감사국' AS STTC_TIT1 ,'0' AS STTC_COL1 ,'0' AS STTC_COL2 ,'0' AS STTC_COL3 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT CASE WHEN SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),6,2) = '12' THEN TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)) ELSE TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)-1) END AS AUD_YR ,'9' AS ROW_KND_CD ,'Y' AS VIEW_YN ,'지방행정감사1국' AS STTC_TIT1 ,'0' AS STTC_COL1 ,'0' AS STTC_COL2 ,'0' AS STTC_COL3 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT CASE WHEN SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),6,2) = '12' THEN TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)) ELSE TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)-1) END AS AUD_YR ,'10' AS ROW_KND_CD ,'Y' AS VIEW_YN ,'지방행정감사2국' AS STTC_TIT1 ,'0' AS STTC_COL1 ,'0' AS STTC_COL2 ,'0' AS STTC_COL3 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT CASE WHEN SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),6,2) = '12' THEN TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)) ELSE TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)-1) END AS AUD_YR ,'11' AS ROW_KND_CD ,'Y' AS VIEW_YN ,'국방감사단' AS STTC_TIT1 ,'0' AS STTC_COL1 ,'0' AS STTC_COL2 ,'0' AS STTC_COL3 FROM DUAL

/* kr.go.bai.eip.aep.arp.dao.FAACAV215QMapper.selectSttcList */ SELECT T1.RMK ,T1.ADM_OPIN ,TO_CHAR(T1.STTC_PROD_STAD_DY,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS STTC_PROD_STAD_DY ,CASE WHEN T1.STTC_DTM_DY IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS STTC_DTM_YN ,T2.STTC_TYP_CD ,T2.STTC_CLSF_CD ,T2.STTC_TYP_SEQ ,T2.STTC_DATA_SNO ,T2.STTC_TIT1 ,T2.STTC_COL1 ,T2.STTC_COL2 ,T2.STTC_COL3 ,CASE WHEN T1.STTC_YR - 5 > T2.AUD_YR THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END VIEW_YN ,CASE WHEN T1.STTC_YR - 4 > T2.AUD_YR THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END CHART_VIEW_YN ,T2.AUD_YR ,T2.ROW_KND_CD ,NVL(TO_CHAR(T1.STTC_DTM_DY,'YYYY"-"MM"-"DD'),'미확정') AS STTC_DTM_DY FROM TWFAACAV200M T1 INNER JOIN TWFAACAV200D T2 ON ( T1.STTC_TYP_CD = T2.STTC_TYP_CD AND T1.STTC_CLSF_CD = T2.STTC_CLSF_CD AND T1.STTC_TYP_SEQ = T2.STTC_TYP_SEQ ) WHERE T1.STTC_CLSF_CD = '215' AND T1.STTC_TYP_SEQ = #{sttcTypSeq} ORDER BY STTC_DATA_SNO
mapper.insert:
/* kr.go.bai.eip.faa.cav.dao.FAACAV215QMapper.insertMaster */
INSERT INTO TWFAACAV200M ( STTC_TYP_CD ,STTC_CLSF_CD ,STTC_TYP_SEQ ,STTC_YR ,STTC_STR_MON ,STTC_END_MON ,STTC_PROD_STAD_DY ,STTC_DTM_DY ,RMK ,ADM_OPIN ,FRT_USR_ID ,FNL_USR_ID ,FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD ,FNL_MNU_ID ,FRT_REGI_DH ,FNL_MDF_DH ) VALUES ( '20' ,'215' ,( SELECT NVL(MAX(STTC_TYP_SEQ), 0) + 1 FROM TWFAACAV200M WHERE STTC_TYP_CD = '20' AND STTC_CLSF_CD = '215' ) ,SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -12), 0, 4) ,'01' ,'12' ,#{proStadDt} ,'' ,#{rmk} ,#{admOpin} ,#{usrId} ,#{usrId} ,#{dptCd} ,#{mnuId} ,SYSDATE ,SYSDATE )

/* kr.go.bai.eip.faa.cav.dao.FAACAV215QMapper.insertDetail */
INSERT INTO TWFAACAV200D ( STTC_TYP_CD ,STTC_CLSF_CD ,STTC_TYP_SEQ ,STTC_DATA_SNO ,STTC_TIT1 ,STTC_COL1 ,STTC_COL2 ,STTC_COL3 ,AUD_YR ,ROW_KND_CD ,FRT_USR_ID ,FNL_USR_ID ,FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD ,FNL_MNU_ID ,FRT_REGI_DH ,FNL_MDF_DH ) VALUES ( '20' ,'215' ,( SELECT NVL(MAX(STTC_TYP_SEQ), 0) FROM TWFAACAV200M WHERE STTC_TYP_CD = '20' AND STTC_CLSF_CD = '215' ) ,( SELECT NVL(MAX(STTC_DATA_SNO), 0) + 1 FROM TWFAACAV200D WHERE STTC_TYP_CD = '20' AND STTC_CLSF_CD = '215' AND STTC_TYP_SEQ = ( SELECT NVL(MAX(STTC_TYP_SEQ), 0) FROM TWFAACAV200M WHERE STTC_TYP_CD = '20' AND STTC_CLSF_CD = '215' )) ,#{sttcTit1} ,#{sttcCol1} ,#{sttcCol2} ,#{sttcCol3} ,#{audYr} ,#{rowKndCd} ,#{usrId} ,#{usrId} ,#{dptCd} ,#{mnuId} ,SYSDATE ,SYSDATE )
